verbs.description: ' [ARG1: Iran ’s Military Budget] [V: is] [ARG2: up more than 40 %] [ARGM-TMP: since the Obama negotiated Nuclear Deal was reached] ... [ARGM-ADV: just another indicator that it was all a big lie . But not anymore] ! , ' Trump tweeted on Saturday night .
